title: Episode 1
description: Enjoy our recorded session from last week as our ever-charming Senior VP, Saad Hassan and our agile Director HR, Zarrar Mumtaz, hosted by the beloved Seher Ibrahim, answer all your queries and give you a sneak peek into the hustle and bustle of life at NUST.

title: Episode 2
description: Watch as our very own VP Operations, Umar Rehman and the wonderful VP Media, Izza Babar hosted by the delight of the show, Rejja Irfan break down everything you need to know about life at NUST.

title: Episode 3
description: Catch last week's recorded session for the third episode of ON station where our beloved President for ON'21 - Usman Khan and our very talented Director ER- Irdam Kakakhel answer all your queries and share stories that reflect on the true essence of the NUST life!
